message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about I sell it to you for $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. But I'm willing to make one more offer. How about I sell it to you for $125?
I'm getting close to buying from John, but I'd still like to try to get a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $122?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $125, that's my final offer.
